availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Hamilton Daviess McKee (Anderson County attorney and prov govt)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, attorney and provisional government convention member. Kentucky native. Married to Martha E. Witherspoon McKee. Father of Lewis Witherspoon McKee, John Joseph McKee, and William H. McKee. Graduate of University of Louisville Law School on March 1, 1848. Attorney in Anderson County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Anderson County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
